scripts.install:all: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm install --prefix client --legacy-peer-deps && npm install --prefix server --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix client --legacy-peer-deps && npm install --prefix server --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n API,WEB -c green,cyan "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
